Body:
gffs = copy.deepcopy(self.example.gffs)
trans = copy.deepcopy(self.example.tas)
stc.assign_parent(gffs[0], trans[0], 'CDS')
self.assertDictEqual(gffs[0].attributes, {'Parent': 'tran0', 'locus_tag':
    'SAOUHSC_00001', 'protein_id': 'YP_498609.1', 'gene': 'dnaA', 'Name':
    'YP_498609.1', 'ID': 'gene0'})
self.assertDictEqual(trans[0].attributes, {'type': 'cover_CDS,cover_CDS',
    'associated_tss': 'TSS:313_+,TSS:1641_+,TSS:2128_+,TSS:2131_+', 'Name':
    'Transcript_00000', 'associated_CDS': 'SAOUHSC_00001', 'ID': 'tran0',
    'associated_cds': 'YP_498609.1,YP_498610.1'})
